value.name: Draft Review: Andre Johnson, greatness expected and achieved
value.description: Andre Johnson was a pass-catching machine for the Houston Texans, catching at least 100 passes in five of his 14 NFL seasons. Is the NFL's 11th all-time receiver worthy of the Hall of Fame?

provider.name: Talk of Fame on FanNation on MSN.com

value.name: Waterloo police break up fraud ring operating throughout the Greater Toronto Area
value.description: Waterloo Regional Police say men from Kitchener, Pickering and Newcastle were allegedly part of a ring that was stealing almost $400,000 in construction and farm equipment.

value.name: Tickets issued in connection with Wilmot anti-racism event
value.description: The Waterloo Region Police Service has issued tickets to people in connection with the anti-racism rally held in Baden, Ont. earlier this month.

value.name: 'Cruel, selfish and evil': Kitchener family traumatized after anti-Asian hate crime
value.description: A Kitchener family says they are traumatized after an anti-Asian hate crime over the weekend that police are calling violent, troubling and "deeply disturbing."

video.name: 'Cruel, selfish and evil': Kitchener family traumatized after anti-Asian hate crime

value.name: Waterloo Regional Police have laid almost 100 distracted driving charges a month this year
value.description: Waterloo Regional Police say that officers laid 395 distracted driving charges from New Year’s Day to May 1 whereas that total came in at 157 a year earlier.
